import { useState } from "react"; import ReactPlayer from "react-player" import "./aboutme.scss" export default function Aboutme() { const [abStyle, setAbStyle] = useState(false); const [currentSlide, setCurrentSlide] = useState(0) const data = [ { id: 1, }, { id: 2, }, { id: 3, }, ]; const handleClick = (way) => { way === "left" ? setCurrentSlide(currentSlide > 0 ? currentSlide - 1 : 2) : setCurrentSlide(currentSlide < data.length - 1 ? currentSlide + 1 : 0); } return (

setAbStyle(!abStyle)}>About Me
